info.title: Liferay Commerce Admin Order API
info.description: Liferay Commerce Admin Order API. A Java client JAR is available for use with the group ID 'com.liferay', artifact ID 'com.liferay.headless.commerce.admin.order.client', and version '4.0.50'.

accountToOAuth2DxpAuthorization.description: Information about the object relationship accountToOAuth2DxpAuthorization can be embedded with "nestedFields".

accountEntryToUserAdditionalInfo.description: Information about the object relationship accountEntryToUserAdditionalInfo can be embedded with "nestedFields".

accountEntryToPublisherAssets.description: Information about the object relationship accountEntryToPublisherAssets can be embedded with "nestedFields".

description.example: right stairs, first room on the left

dataType.description: The field type (e.g., image, text, etc.).

name.description: The field's internal name. This is valid for comparisons and unique in the structured content.

data.description: The field's content value for simple types.

additionalProperties.description: The localized field's content values for simple types.

data_i18n.description: The localized field's content values for simple types.

latitude.description: The latitude of a point in space.

longitude.description: The longitude of a point in space.

Geo.description: A point determined by latitude and longitude.

additionalProperties.example: {en_US=Hand Saw, hr_HR=Product Name HR, hu_HU=Product Name HU}

name.example: {en_US=Hand Saw, hr_HR=Product Name HR, hu_HU=Product Name HU}

description.example: right stairs, first room on the left

content.example: This order will be shipped separately

additionalProperties.example: {en_US=Term Description US, hr_HR=Term Description HR, hu_HU=Term Description HU}

description.example: {en_US=Term Description US, hr_HR=Term Description HR, hu_HU=Term Description HU}

additionalProperties.example: {en_US=Term Label US, hr_HR=Term Label HR, hu_HU=Term Label HU}

label.example: {en_US=Term Label US, hr_HR=Term Label HR, hu_HU=Term Label HU}
